oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pension application for Francis Diane Davis, widow of Pvt. Noah L. Davis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pension documents of Francis Diane Davis, widow of Pvt. Noah Louis Davis, Co. K, 9th Tenn Cav. USA. This pension was granted in the amount of $25 per month. Some of the back-and-forth correspondence between Dept. of Interior bureaucrats and Mrs. Davis's Rockwood attorneys illustrate the difficulties faced by the veterans' heirs in navigating the shoals of the Federal pension process.
